channel.title: Recommend a Good Source?
channel.description:
Hello, I'm looking to develope a good server, bud sadly...I can't seem tofindany good sources. I've searched and searched and searched and have not found what I have been looking for. Help me out a bit? :)
[u]I'm looking for the following in a source:[/u]
[ul][li]Godswords[/li] [li]3rd-Age Equipment[/li] [li]Dark Bow[/li] [li]Easy-to-run server (click on "run-server" and open a client and done)[/li] [li]Isn't in one place[/li] [li]Doesn't have a world-wide wilderness[/li] [li]Emotes are emotes, not teleporters[/li] [li]Teleporting spells work[/li] [li]Might post more later...[/li][/ul]
Anyways, I must be heading off to bed soon, so I will read the comments later. Goodnight and thank-you for your help. :)

item.title: Recommend a Good Source?
item.dc:creator: @PeterMan PeterMan
item.description:
@PeterMan wrote:

I think you misunderstood me.

www.moparisthebest.com, is not for private servers.

However

www.moparisthebest.com/smf, is for private servers.

Ask your question there

Hope you get some answers there, good luck!

EDIT: Just read your edit and yes, thats what I meant.

Read full topic

item.title: Recommend a Good Source?
item.dc:creator: @Vulcan_Wicked Vulcan_Wicked
item.description:
@Vulcan_Wicked wrote:

Hmm, yes…Moparscape was the very first server I learned of and tried. It doesn’t have some of the features I would like to have and I’m no good at adding such features.

Moparscape is always an option, but I’m looking for something else…

EDIT: Oh…did I misunderstand your post, did you mean to redirect me to the correct place to post this at?

Read full topic

item.title: Recommend a Good Source?
item.dc:creator: @PeterMan PeterMan
item.description:
@PeterMan wrote:

Not to be a total douche or anything, but…

www.moparisthebest.com/smf

But don’t worry, alot of people mix up between moparisthebest and moparscape, 2 different pages, same creator.

Read full topic

item.title: Recommend a Good Source?
item.dc:creator: @Vulcan_Wicked Vulcan_Wicked
item.description:
@Vulcan_Wicked wrote:

Hello, I’m looking to develope a good server, bud sadly…I can’t seem tofindany good sources. I’ve searched and searched and searched and have not found what I have been looking for. Help me out a bit?

I’m looking for the following in a source:

[ul][li]Godswords[/li]
[li]3rd-Age Equipment[/li]
[li]Dark Bow[/li]
[li]Easy-to-run server (click on “run-server” and open a client and done)[/li]
[li]Isn’t in one place[/li]
[li]Doesn’t have a world-wide wilderness[/li]
[li]Emotes are emotes, not teleporters[/li]
[li]Teleporting spells work[/li]
[li]Might post more later…[/li][/ul]
